main event: A commercial pilot observed a formation of transparent, shiny objects maneuvering at high speed over Lima, Peru on August 5, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were described as 'flying discs' that were 'transparent' and 'shiny'.
The objects maneuvered at high speed and were observed at an altitude of around 30,000 feet.
The objects were visible for 15-20 seconds before disappearing.
Witnesses had reported seeing similar objects over Lima the previous day.
The conclusion in the report was that the objects were likely a balloon, possibly from Saisan.
sighted object: transparent, shiny objects described as 'flying discs'
